title: Getting a Conviction in the George Floyd Case
itunes:title: Getting a Conviction in the George Floyd Case
description:
Former federal prosecutor Elie Honig, of Lowenstein Sandler, discusses the new charges against the four police officers in the death of George Floyd and how difficult it will be to get a conviction. June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
